reportincident-dialog-additional-details: Add context that could be helpful for a reviewer. You may include links that highlight the incident.
reportincident-dialog-violator-label: The user {{GENDER:|you}} would like to report
reportincident-dialog-something-else-inp: Specify the behaviors not listed above.
reportincident-dialog-harassment-empty: {{GENDER:|You}} must select at least one behavior.
reportincident-dialog-violator-empty: {{GENDER:|You}} must specify a username to report.
reportincident-dialog-something-else-emp: Please provide a short description of the behavior.
reportincident-dialog-violator-nonexiste: {{GENDER:|You}} must provide an existing username to report.
reportincident-dialog-internet-disconnec: Looks like you don't have internet connection. Please try re-submitting when your connection is back.
reportincident-dialog-server-error: Sorry, looks like our server is not responding. Please try re-submitting.
reportincident-dialog-generic-error: {{GENDER:|Your}} request could not be submitted due to an error. Please try re-submitting.
reportincident-success-message: Report successfully filed. An administrator will review and determine whether the incident violates our policies. Thanks for helping us keep {{SITENAME}} safe.
reportincident-email-body:
Reporting user: $1
Reported user: $2
$3: $4

Behaviors: $5
Details: $6

Email $1: $7
reportincident-emaildialog-content: We need {{GENDER:|your}} verified email address to provide updates on the report or follow up if necessary. Please add or verify {{GENDER:|your}} email address from {{GENDER:|your}} user account settings before filing a report.
reportincident-confirmedemail-required: A confirmed email address is required to submit an incident report.
reportincident-type-immediate-threat-phy: Intending to commit violence against an individual, harming oneself, or an act of mass violence
reportincident-unacceptable-behavior-foo: Inappropriate behavior is [[Foundation:Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Universal_Code_of_Conduct#3_â€“_Unacceptable_behaviour|not tolerated]] on {{SITENAME}}, and is managed by the community.
reportincident-physical-harm-footer: Your report is [[Foundation:Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Privacy_policy#How_We_Use_Information_We_Receive_From_You|private]] and will be sent to the [[meta:Special:MyLanguage/Threats_of_harm|Wikimedia Foundation emergency team]] for review.
reportincident-type-incident-required: Please select the type of incident
reportincident-threat-harm-required: "Threat of harm" option must be provided
